name: Live Piano
description: Live Piano is a Web Application that I implemented so Pianists around the world can play togheter. The user is able to create easy a lobby and invite his friends just with a code. I realized this project by implementing a self managing Lobby system with Websockets.

readMore.introduction: Live Piano is a Web Application that I implemented so Pianists around the world can play togheter. The user is able to create easy a lobby and invite his friends just with a code. I realized this project by implementing a self managing Lobby system with Websockets.

name: Speded-Typer
description: Speed-Typer is a small mini game as web application written in Angular. In Speed-Typer you have to type as fast as possible the displayed random letters to break the Highscore. This project was there to get first touch with a Javascript frameworks and first usage of cookies to store the score temporary
